abstract.original_text: This is a well written paper that has relevance for those conducting malaria evaluation studies, developing surveillance strategies, and identifying relevant interventions for areas scaling up for elimination. The statistical analysis is appropriate; this work is reproducible, if one has high level statistical skills. To strengthen the paper, there are a couple of areas in need of further clarification. I have the following comments:

sentences.segment_text: This is a well written paper that has relevance for those conducting malaria evaluation studies ,
developing surveillance strategies , and identifying relevant interventions for areas scaling up for elimination .
The statistical analysis is appropriate ; this work is reproducible ,
if one has high level statistical skills .
To strengthen the paper , there are a couple of areas in need of further clarification .
